notes: This map illustrates satellite-detected damage and destruction in a portion of the city of Ramadi, Al Anbar Province, Iraq. Using satellite imagery acquired 02 December, 11 November and 06 July 2014, UNOSAT identified a total of 168 affected structures within the area of this map. Approximatively 61 of these were destroyed, 24 severely damaged and 83 moderately damaged. The city-wide analysis of Ramadi revealed a total of 208 affected structures, of which 72 were destroyed, 33 severely damaged and 103 moderately damaged. This is a preliminary analysis and has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR / UNOSAT.
